summary:
My experience in multiple disciplines of chemistry, common sense and analytical thinking make me good innovator in the field of chemical sciences. My easy communication and ability to make bonds across teams and cultures help me to work, lead and coordinate across teams. My personal drive and enthusiasm that drives me every day to achieve and to set bigger goals. I have developed feasible commercial processes in chemical industry, (7 granted and 2 filed patents)  and have produced excellent scientific publications in reputed journals. I am recipient of Senior Research Fellowship (SRF), Govt. of India and Alexander van Humboldt (AvH) research fellowship from Federal republic of Germany. Secured first in my Master‚Äôs degree  in Physical chemistry specialization and stood first at Ph D entrance examination.

I enjoy reading and learning history, language and culture apart from sciences. I like to spend good amount of time with my family. My great excitation  in  my work is the identification of problems and the discovery of simple solutions whether it is an improved process or an improved method. My objective is to work in a challenging research and development environment that takes advantage of my skills , experience of working at industry with innovation as major driver.
‚Ä¢	Proven track record in handling research projects from ideation at academic institute to practice (commercialization) at Industry.
‚Ä¢	Experience in working as lead scientist across research teams, internal and external IP departments and R&D administration.
‚Ä¢	Program research, development, planning and evaluation
‚Ä¢	Demonstrated abilities in catalyst design and synthesis, characterization
‚Ä¢	Conversant in both heterogeneous and homogeneous catalysis
‚Ä¢	Good Intellectual property (IP) background. Experience in all aspects of innovation, they include ideation, IP rights, capitalization and valorization aspects
‚Ä¢	Experience in working inorganic, and organic chemistries and material science
